member.name: T:CustomCatalogContext.CustomCatalogButton
member.summary: Access the Catalog context via the FrameworkApplication.ActiveWindow

member.name: T:CustomCatalogContext.Module1
member.summary: Shows how to modify a sampling of different Catalog context menus
member.remarks: The context is retrieved from the FrameworkApplication.ActiveWindow property. Cast that to IProjectWindow to access the SelectedItems enumeration. Each of the selected items can be cast to its respective project item (depending on what "type" of item it is (i.e. map, style, gdb, etc)

member.name: P:CustomCatalogContext.Module1.Current
member.summary: Retrieve the singleton instance to this module here

member.name: M:CustomCatalogContext.Module1.CanUnload
member.summary: Called by Framework when ArcGIS Pro is closing
member.returns: False to prevent Pro from closing, otherwise True
